nodes.text: The Mobile Missile Launcher was a mobile anti-air vehicle used by the Royal Naboo Security Forces. It was in essence an armored speeder fitted with a missile launcher, which was able to spin 360 degrees to target incoming aerial units. The Heavy Mobile Missile Launcher was an upgraded version with two launchers.
Mobile Missile Launchers appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack Clone Campaigns.
